name: ui
content:
# Example based on https://shiny.rstudio.com/gallery/india-blood-banks.html
 
library(shiny)
library(leaflet)

shinyUI(leafletOutput("simpleMap", height = 500))

## You can as well have a navigation bar and multiple tabs
# navbarPage("Switzerland", id = "main",
#            tabPanel("Map", leafletOutput("simpleMap", height = 500)))
